metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: o   Mix flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.  o   Add milk and stir until dough forms.  o   Roll out dough and cut into strips.  o   Fry in hot oil until golden.  o   Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
•   Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
•   Season eggplant slices with salt and let sit for 30 minutes, then pat dry.
•   Cook eggplant until golden brown on both sides.
•   In a baking dish, layer eggplant slices, marinara sauce, and shredded mozzarella cheese.
